channel.title: Recognizing Java
channel.description: Yeah, im on a Windows Vista computer and its totally different from XP, I cant get my computer to recognize Java so that I can run my client.... can anyone with a Vista help me out?

item.title: Recognizing Java
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Ive already downloaded Jdk 6.7, installed it, and changed my compilers code… nothing it working, and whenever I try to run a client it says it cant find the path specified… I dont know what’s up with all the crap its giving me :\

Read full topic

item.title: Recognizing Java
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme trytohaxme
item.description:
@trytohaxme wrote:

Download Jdk6 update 7

then put this in your compiler

@echo off title Build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
